<h1>Complete list of Lithuanian verbs on CoolJugator</h1>
<p>Here you can find the entire list of 4400 Lithuanian verbs on CoolJugator, all on one page. If this page is too large for you, try using our sub-lists.</p>
<div id="verbListChoiceMenu" class="ui segment">
<p><b>Choose Lithuanian verb list:</b></p>
<div class="ui celled horizontal list">
<div class="item"><span>Complete list with 4400 verbs on one page</span></div>
<div class="item"><a href="/lt/list/1">Sub-list No. 1, letters a - p</a></div>
<div class="item"><a href="/lt/list/2">Sub-list No. 2, letters p - ž</a></div>
</div>
</div>
